product_name: Nike Zoom Force 1 Boa Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Nike Zoom Force 1 Boa women's snowboard boots outfit your feet for conquering the steeps, and feature dual-zone Boa(R) closures so you can get a fast, dialed-in fit for all-day comfort. Dual-zone Boa Coiler lacing system, with ankle and cable guides along entire edge of eyestays, distributes closure force evenly for a dialed-in fit that won't loosen up. The Coiler scoops up loose cable when entering as well as exiting the boot; put your foot in, pull back on the tongue, twist the reel a few times and you're off. High-end synthetic waterproof leather uppers keep feet dry; full-length internal backstays give boots a medium flex for great control in turns. Custom moldable polyethylene and EVA foam liners feature an easy-to-use, secure lace-lock power strap and stretchy neoprene toe boxes for extra comfort. internal heel harnesses lock liners in place for secure heel hold. Warming Blanket Strobel is a heat reflective material in both the shell and the liner that helps retain heat and keep the cold out. ZF1 full-length phylon midsoles/outsoles feature embedded Zoom Air cushioning for superior comfort when on your board and when walking around. Low-profile Air Force 1 shoe-inspired outsoles feature treads that grip the snow and ensure good board feel.
short_description: Nike Zoom Force 1 Boa women's snowboard boots outfit your feet for conquering the steeps, and feature dual-zone Boa(R) closures so you can get a fast, dialed-in fit for all-day comfort.
